realtime
Class RealtimeTriangulatorThread

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      realtime.RealtimeTriangulatorThread
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class RealtimeTriangulatorThread
extends java.lang.Thread

This class is responsible to create the triangulation and/or simplification of a terrain in real-time.

Constructor Detail

RealtimeTriangulatorThread

public RealtimeTriangulatorThread(TerrainStreamer ts,
                                  java.lang.String terraExePath,
                                  java.lang.String temporaryFilesFolder,
                                  boolean shouldSimplify,
                                  boolean shouldTriangulate)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
Constructor.

Parameters:
ts - The TerrainStreamer object used to retrieve the next list of values that represents the next frame to present.
terraExePath - The path to the Terra exe file.
temporaryFilesFolder - The path to the folder that will hold the temporary .pgm and .smf files.
shouldSimplify - Defines if this thread should simplify the frames.
shouldTriangulate - Defines if this thread should triangulate the frames. NOTE: this path must end with "/" or "\".
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
